TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IExtenderProvider

summary.span: 定义将属性扩展到容器中的其他组件的接口。

span.span: Defines the interface for extending properties to other components in a container.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 扩展程序提供程序是向其他组件提供属性的组件。An extender provider is a component that provides properties to other components. 例如, 控件是一个扩展程序提供程序。For example, the control is an extender provider. 向添加一个控件时, 窗体上的所有其他控件都有一个添加到其属性列表的属性。When you add a control to a , all other controls on the form have a property added to their list of properties. 任何提供扩展程序属性的组件都必须实现。Any component that provides extender properties must implement . 然后, 可视化设计器可以调用来确定容器中的哪些对象应接收扩展程序属性。A visual designer can then call to determine which objects in a container should receive the extender properties. 有关扩展程序提供程序的详细信息[, 请参阅如何:实现扩展程序提供](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d824f40e-b20b-464c-ac22-97974d5ab4fe)程序。For more information about extender providers, see [How to: Implement an Extender Provider](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d824f40e-b20b-464c-ac22-97974d5ab4fe). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何实现接口。The following code example demonstrates how to implement the interface. 此示例是在[如何:实现 HelpLabel 扩展程序提供](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/21e34929-ff78-4f3f-aee8-a16a4ef5ac9d)程序。This example is part of a larger example discussed in [How to: Implement a HelpLabel Extender Provider](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/21e34929-ff78-4f3f-aee8-a16a4ef5ac9d). [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.HelpLabel#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HelpLabel/CS/HelpLabel.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.HelpLabel#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HelpLabel/VB/HelpLabel.vb#1)]

summary.span: 指定此对象是否可以将其扩展程序属性提供给指定的对象。

span.span: Specifies whether this object can provide its extender properties to the specified object.

returns.span: 如果此对象可以扩展程序属性提供给指定对象，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if this object can provide extender properties to the specified object; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关扩展程序属性的详细信息, [请参阅如何:实现扩展程序提供](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d824f40e-b20b-464c-ac22-97974d5ab4fe)程序。For more information on extender properties, see [How to: Implement an Extender Provider](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d824f40e-b20b-464c-ac22-97974d5ab4fe). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何实现属性。The following code example demonstrates how to implement the property. 此示例是在[如何:实现 HelpLabel 扩展程序提供](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/21e34929-ff78-4f3f-aee8-a16a4ef5ac9d)程序。This example is part of a larger example discussed in [How to: Implement a HelpLabel Extender Provider](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/21e34929-ff78-4f3f-aee8-a16a4ef5ac9d).
